regen.absent_element: situation that accounts with history are deactivated
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically deactivate user accounts that have a history associated with them.

regen.absent_element: archiving accounts that cannot be immediately deleted
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an option to archive accounts that cannot be immediately deleted to retain records.

regen.absent_element: treatment of accounts with history in deactivation
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that accounts with history are deactivated to maintain record integrity.

label: If an account has any history associated with it, it can only be deactivated and not deleted.
absence: situation of an account has any history
